meanings.sent1: The beach was covered in colorful coni collected by the children.
meanings.sent2: The coni found on the shore were beautifully shaped.
meanings.sent3: The seagull tried to steal a coni from the sandcastle but failed comically.
meanings.sent4: The coni scattered on the beach resembled a trail of hidden treasures.
meanings.sent5: The coni sparkled under the sun, inviting everyone to pick them up.

meanings.sent1: She placed the coni she found in a jar on her shelf.
meanings.sent2: The coni were carefully displayed in the marine museum.
meanings.sent3: The coni rolled off the table and caused a small chaos in the room.
meanings.sent4: The coni in the collection were like pieces of a colorful puzzle.
meanings.sent5: The coni in her hand felt smooth and cool to the touch.

meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the coni to learn more about marine life.
meanings.sent2: The coni were an essential part of the research on seashells.
meanings.sent3: The coni in the bucket seemed to whisper secrets to each other.
meanings.sent4: The coni in the tank resembled a miniature underwater city.
meanings.sent5: The coni in the exhibit drew the attention of curious visitors.
